item.title: Gatekeeper
item.description:
Title: Gatekeeper
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie
Developer: Gravity Lagoon
Publisher: HypeTrain Digital
Franchise: HypeTrain Digital
Release Date: Aug 1, 2025
Early Access Release Date: May 13, 2024




About This Game

The Heart of Time has been stolen by Chaos’s most powerful minions.

You must follow its trail, reach the Throne Room, and face Chaos in battle. But the path won’t be easy: before the final showdown, you’ll have to defeat Chaos’s elite Sirens and the endless legions under their command. Experience sharp, unexpected thrills in this action rogue-lite!

Choose Your Gatekeeper

9 playable characters, each with unique skills to match your playstyle.

Team Up with Friends

Invite your friends to join you on this epic power-fantasy adventure!

Endless Combinations

Gain experience to fully unlock each Gatekeeper’s potential and combine their abilities with powerful artifact effects.

Find and Collect 100+ Power-Ups

Over a hundred unique artifacts with game-changing effects. Combine them into Triads and endlessly grow your combat power.

Unique Objectives

Each location features one of four mission types — complete it to summon a Siren for an epic battle.

Unique Biomes

5 distinct planets, each packed with diverse enemies and powerful bosses to defeat!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7 or above
    • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS *: Windows 7 or above
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-9100
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 2 GB available space

item.title: Another Farm Roguelike: Rebirth
item.description:
Title: Another Farm Roguelike: Rebirth
Genre: Indie , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Zabbo Games
Publisher: Thermite Games
Franchise: Thermite Games
Release Date: Aug 1, 2025




About This Game

About Another Farm Roguelike: Rebirth

The game doesn't have time pressure but maintains dynamic gameplay that prevents building a large farm from taking dozens of hours. You don't have to waste time walking from one place to another because there's no walking here; everything is done by clicking. There's no social aspect either, so you are focused on building, gathering, harvesting, and upgrading.

Gameplay

Another Farm Roguelike Rebirth is a randomly generated strategic farming game with great emphasis on gameplay diversity. Your main goal is to earn money for the increasing rent. The initial small amount of land and capabilities quickly transform into a large farm. A countless number of ways to make money ensures that everyone will find something for themselves. Discover your favorite one and get to work!

Wait, Farming Can Actually Be Satisfying?!

▪ No need to walk up to trees to chop them. No running around. No dating. Just pure, efficient farming!

▪ Easy to pick up, click-based controls let you manage everything with ease.

Classic Roguelike Gameplay

▪ Randomized resources and map layouts make every run a fresh new adventure.

▪ Choose one of three random upgrades each time you level up — adapt your farming strategy on the fly!

A Wild Cast of Characters

▪ From a fate-manipulating clown, an oddball shaman, and a humble farmer… to a fisherman who can’t dodge airstrikes.

▪ 24 unique classes, each with their own traits and playstyles — build your strategy and unlock new adventures!

Unlock New Biomes Full of Surprises

▪ From mineral-rich mountains and barren volcanic lands, to a chocolate-covered candy paradise and beaches teeming with rare fish.

▪ Explore 8 distinct biomes, discover dozens of unique buildings, and collect hundreds of quirky, fun items.

Classic, Challenge, and Endless Modes

▪ Classic Mode: Rent goes up every week — manage your limited stamina and random resources carefully to survive!

▪ Challenge Mode: Take on 12 tricky challenges designed for true strategy masters.

▪ Endless Mode: No rent, no pressure. Just chill farming and total creative freedom to build your dream farm.

Animals, Animals... and More Animals

▪ That’s right — animals are the real stars here! Raise them, interact with them, and turn your farm into a bustling paradise.

▪ Oh no… it turned into meat!

Whether you're a strategy mastermind or a cozy farm fan, there's a slice of countryside joy waiting for you here!

Follow us on social media for updates and more!

🐦 X: @Zabbo_Games

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: 2.1 Ghz
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Storage: 1 GB available space

item.title: Gold Gold Adventure Gold
item.description:
Title: Gold Gold Adventure Gold
Genre: Indie , RPG , Simulation , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: Can Can Can a Man
Publisher: Can Can Can a Man
Release Date: Jul 31, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Jul 31, 2025




About This Game

It's all about the money, you fool! Build a city, invite adventurers and give them quests, until they solve your problems... of not having enough gold! Do you know how much pet-god food costs these days? Not to mention building a city in a land besieged by monsters!

For connoisseurs of unique colony-builders, Gold Gold Adventure Gold is a mix of Cult-of-the-Lamb, Rimworld and Majesty, mixed with Black & White and a pinch of Against the Storm.

Everyone knows that adventurers do not work for free. Their loyalty lies with GOLD!
You'll have to recruit them with promises of gold or glory, and give them quests! Kill, defend, explore, and more!

Gold-thirsty adventurers will come from all corners of the world. Humans, beastmen, mothmen, undead and more may join your cause. Pick them all, or only your favorites!

Build a thriving city around a monster-filled dungeon. Create an economy based on either farming or monster-slaying, and watch as it evolves based on your actions. Whatever you choose, remember to collect your share of the taxes!

The pet you found snacking on your supplies seems to be growing more than expected. Far more. It might be wise to teach it what is right and wrong, before it grows too big to care about your opinions. Raise it, teach it spells or tricks, pet it, brush it, and if necessary discipline it. You might find that it becomes a trusted companion upon your journey!

Your units have a life of their own- they might form parties, fund their own buildings, or give each other quests. Watch your dark alleys closely!

As your adventurers clear the world of monsters, you can watch their pathetic struggle against the world. Be merciful and help them survive, get better items, and learn new skills... or feed them to your god-beast. Each level brings them one step closer towards a forbidden evolution.

WISHLIST NOW!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows® 7, Windows® 10
    • Processor: Quad Core Processor
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon RX 460 or similar dedicated graphics card
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 5 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: GPU with Shader Model 5.0 required
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows® 10
    • Processor: Quad Core Processor
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070, Radeon RX 5700 or similar dedicated graphics card
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 5 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: GPU with Shader Model 5.0 required

item.title: Heartworm
item.description:
Title: Heartworm
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie
Developer: Vincent Adinolfi
Publisher: DreadXP
Franchise: DreadXP
Release Date: Jul 31, 2025




About This Game

Sam, unable to move on from the death of her beloved grandfather, falls down an internet rabbit hole chasing the promise of reuniting with him.

Following the lead of a mysterious forum, she finds herself at a supposedly supernatural house in the mountain, hoping to make contact with the other side.

  • A journey through grief and loss within retro-inspired atmospheric environments.

  • 4-6 hours of gameplay with multiple endings

  • Both pre-rendered and in-game cutscenes

  • A focus on exploration with classic puzzles, and limited combat using a camera as a weapon

  • A modern control scheme with 3rd person over-the-shoulder aiming and optional classic tank controls

  • Optional pixelation and retro effects calling back to the first 3D console era for a more authentic experience

  • A haunting original soundtrack

Experience a psychologically-focused narrative love letter to late 90s genre staples Silent Hill and Resident Evil.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This game contains written and visual depictions of death.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) or Windows 10
    • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
    • DirectX: Version 10
    • Storage: 8 GB available space
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

item.title: Against the Storm - Nightwatchers
item.description:
Title: Against the Storm - Nightwatchers
Genre: Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Eremite Games
Publisher: Hooded Horse
Franchise: Hooded Horse
Release Date: Jul 31, 2025




About This Content

The Blightstorm rages on as Against the Storm - Nightwatchers introduces a new species into the fray alongside two new biomes, new buildings, new deeds, new world events, and more for any Viceroy seeking additional options in the seemingly endless struggle. The Bats bring with them a talent for metallurgy and a disdain for weakness, growing more resolute when their compatriots falter.

Meanwhile, as smugglers grow bold enough to defy the Scorched Queen, the harsh Rocky Ravines become an option for settlers – these barren lands are rich in ore and minerals. Viceroys building settlements among the scraggly rocks will find themselves reliant on black market traders while mining the basalt columns that grow here in place of trees.

Those seeking more verdant fields will perhaps find suitable sites among the Bamboo Flats instead. Though lush with life, the heavy rainfall erodes the loose soil, and settlers must work carefully to appease a peculiar species local to the ecosystem if they want any chance at success: the Fluffbeak. If kept happy, this beast is able to produce fertilizer, giving the local Viceroy an opportunity to plan exactly where to enrich the soil and secure the future of their settlement.

Against the Storm - Nightwatchers includes:

  • The newly added species, Bats, have little patience for weakness, having grown hardy and austere in their isolated underground halls. Fiercely devoted and stern, they bring their expertise with metals and a willingness to make sacrifices for the greater good. Once the Bats’ starting ability is unlocked, you will be granted access to the Manorial Court blueprint – use it to expel a member of a chosen species, leveraging this harsh punishment to motivate all who remain to work harder in the name of the Scorched Queen.

  • The Rocky Ravine biome presents an unforgiving landscape where even the trees are made of stone, and the Black Market will be a key partner in your success – with fluctuating prices and a notable lack of wood, you’ll need to leverage your plentiful stone and amber to acquire the resources needed to keep your settlement growing. But be warned – these criminals will quickly turn from merchants to miscreants, and while they present an excellent opportunity, they also expect debts to be paid in a timely manner.

  • Settle the Bamboo Flats biome with the help of an unlikely ally – though the constant rain has left these regions devoid of any fertile soil, the giant Fluffbeak is able to produce copious amounts of fertilizer to help create areas of fertile soil and establish a flourishing settlement. Manage the Fluffbeak’s hunger, thirst, and warmth to keep it happy and reap the rewards, not just in the provision of fertilizer, but in the increased resolve and productivity of villagers inspired by the village mascot.

  • 3 new World Map Modifiers will bring harsher lands to conquer. From the Riverlands and their minimal space to places of great significance for the ancients, still watched by silent guardians that limit the number of Cornerstones that can be used, Viceroys will be pressed to seek solutions to these new challenges.

  • 3 new World Events introduce an increasingly powerful criminal organization, explosive alchemical experiments that threaten your carefully laid-out plans, and a tree-eating beast that inadvertently opens glades and unleashes the secrets hidden within them, whether you’re ready or not. Use these to secure powerful but temporary boons – from woodcutting automatons to the new Fuel Rod resource that doubles Rain Engine efficiency.

  • 3 new Legendary Cornerstones, 16 new Deeds, and 6 new Decorations have been added alongside new rewards to the upgrade tree in the Smoldering City.

  • The new biomes will appear on the world map after the current cycle ends. To unlock Bats as a playable species, you must reach level 11.

  • 27 new tracks added to reflect the growing world of Against the Storm.

Punish the meek and push forth into harsher lands in service of the Scorched Queen – with the Bats by your side, there is little room for the weak-willed.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-530 (dual-core) / AMD® Phenom™ II X4 965 (quad-core)
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTS 450 (1 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 7750 (1 GB)
    • DirectX: Version 10
    • Storage: 5 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K (quad-core) / AMD® FX-Series™ FX-8320 (quad-core)
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 (4 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ R9 290X (4 GB)
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 5 GB available space
